name: clprompter
displayName: Bob Cozzi's CL Prompter for IBM i
description: Bob Cozzi's CL Prompter for IBM i CL commands

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == clle || editorLangId == clp || editorLangId == cl)

clPrompter.kwdColor.description: Parameter keyword color in prompter.  Use CSS color values like ##1a237e, blue, or rgb(34,170,34).

clPrompter.kwdValueColor.description: Parameter value color in prompter.  Use CSS color values like ##1a237e, blue, or rgb(34,170,34).

clPrompter.kwdColorAutoAdjust.description: Parameter keyword color Auto-adjust for best contrast in dark/light/high-contrast themes. If false, uses your color exactly as specified.

clPrompter.cmdLabelIndent.description: Location of the Label (if any) for the CL Command after prompting. Default: 2 (SEU classic).

clPrompter.enableDebugXml.description: Enable writing command XML to debug file. Useful for troubleshooting but not recommended for normal use.

clPrompter.debugXmlPath.description: Directory where cmdDefn.xml debug file is written. Use ${tmpdir} for system temp, ${userHome} for home directory, or an absolute path.

clPrompter.cmdIndent.description: First line command name indent after prompting. Default: 14 (SEU classic).

clPrompter.cmdIndentParm.description: Location of parameter that follows the command name. 0 = single space after command, otherwise column (min 25, SEU classic: 27).

clPrompter.cmdContIndent.description: Secondary CL command line parameter indent after prompting. Default: 27 (SEU classic).

clPrompter.cmdRightMargin.description: Right margin for command formatting. Default: 72 (SEU classic).

clPrompter.cmdKwdCase.description: Controls case conversion for CL command parameter names (keywords): 0 = UPPERCASE, 1 = lowercase.

clPrompter.formatCase.description: Format: Case conversion for CL source. *UPPER = uppercase, *LOWER = lowercase, *NONE = no change.

clPrompter.formatIndentRemarks.description: Format: Indent remarks (comments). *YES = indent comments, *NO = leave at column 1.

clPrompter.formatBeginColumn.description: Format: Starting column for CL commands. Default: 12 (SEU classic).

clPrompter.formatIndentColumn.description: Format: Indentation column for nested commands (DO blocks). Default: 15.

clPrompter.formatIndentContinuation.description: Format: Continuation line indent column. Default: 20.

editor/context.when: editorLangId == clle || editorLangId == clp || editorLangId == cmd || editorLangId == cl
editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == clle || editorLangId == clp || editorLangId == cl)
editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == clle || editorLangId == clp || editorLangId == cl)

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run compile-webview && npm run copy-assets
